summary: The module contains a collection of unit tests that verify the correctness of GPU‑accelerated linear algebra operations provided by the CuPy SciPy compatibility layer. It checks LU factorization and solution reconstruction, triangular system solving, and generation of special matrices, ensuring results match the reference SciPy/NumPy implementations.
business_intent: To guarantee that the GPU‑based linear algebra utilities deliver accurate and reliable results comparable to established CPU libraries, thereby supporting trustworthy scientific and engineering computations on GPU hardware.
